DOC.brief_summary: A clinical study evaluate efficacy safety MK0633 adult patient chronic asthma .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect MK0633 Patients With Chronic Asthma ( 0633-007 )
DOC.criteria: Documented clinical history symptom chronic asthma , include dyspnea , wheeze , chest tightness , cough , and/or sputum production Males females 1870 year age History kidney chronic liver disease Recent history heart problem within past 3 month Evidence another clinically significant , active lung disorder bronchiectasis COPD
